description:
Now that Tsuna has defeated the Torikabuto and Yamamoto has defeated the Phantom Knight, the group decides to go directly after the opponents’ target. Daisy is frightened, and Kikyo tells her that she has been pretending to be in a pinch just to entertain Byakuran. The real six Funeral Wreaths have yet to give it their all. Just then, Tsuna’s contacts’ navigation system goes awry. In the meantime, Kikyo swiftly destroys their decoy and moves closer to Irie. The real six Funeral Wreaths are surging forward to catch up!
Source: crunchyroll
